title: Banning the farm bots?
body:
Hey Riot so I have a question,

So just to try out couple mechanics and play style for certain champs in bot, I realized there has been some eerily pattern for certain players in bot.

In other words, certain players NEVER talk or communicate. That's not all, I have observed that they hide behind minions and just spam spells and attacks towers even though they are getting hit and even after all the minions died.

I realized it was those farm bots that level up accounts. As usual I have reported every single one of them.
However, what frightens me is that they are farming these "sale" account while ruining newbies game and i've seen them in 3 out of 5 game-ish.

So shouldn't Riot do something about these? Or nah?

replies.body:
Technically, players are not forced to use chat at all.  If you do feel that some of them might be acting suspicious or could be bots, submitting a report in the post-game lobby was a solid step.  This will help us investigate these cases, and thwart it.  As a heads up, though, I did remove those player links from your post.  Naming and shaming or putting the spotlight on others like that isn't fun for anyone, especially if they turn out not to be who you think.  :D

If this is something you'd like to discuss more, though, hit up our [Player Behavior ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation)boards with any feedback you've got!
